item.title: Problem with dice system
item.dc:creator: @Skrillex_Craft Skrillex_Craft
item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

[quote=“Null Amount, post:36, topic:526476”][quote author=Skrillex_Craft link=topic=645222.msg4344867#msg4344867 date=1375730088]

[quote author=Null Amount link=topic=645222.msg4344861#msg4344861 date=1375729907]

[quote author=Skrillex_Craft link=topic=645222.msg4344679#msg4344679 date=1375705360]

[quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=645222.msg4344669#msg4344669 date=1375702815]
… What?
[/quote]so i had a source to test my fixes before i launch them (a copy of the original source) where i edit and look if it gives errors i deleted it becoz of 100 errors

now i recopied my original source to get back to testing for errors when i add something new and i redid everything that was said on this topic and still keeps saying Dice = Dice is deleted becoz of scams and bank losses

and when i klick on the Roll Friends it says Rolling… but no nr showing up if you can help i’l pm my teamvieuwer details so u can look into it with me
[/quote]If you deleted it correctly like last time, it wouldn’t give the “Dice is deleted” message.
[/quote]i redid everything and compiled then ran the server logged in toke ma dice bag (tried with all of them) keeps saying all off the above
[/quote]If the compiler outputs errors, then it doesn’t compile. Post your dicing snippet again.[/quote]will do just wait a sec need to look trough the scripts

} if (itemId == 15098 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 1200) { //Dice Bag ID if (c.playerRights < 1) { c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to dice."); return; } if (!c.inAclan) { c.sendMessage("Join a clan chat channel first!"); return; } int roll = Misc.random(99) + 1; Server.clanChat.playerMessageToClan(c.playerId, "[DICE YELL]: " + c.playerName + " rolled " + roll + " on the percentile dice."); c.startAnimation(11900); c.gfx0(2075); c.diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); } }*/

@I am beast

Donator level = 4 i tought

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with dice system
item.dc:creator: @Skrillex_Craft Skrillex_Craft
item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

[quote=“Null Amount, post:26, topic:526476”][quote author=Skrillex_Craft link=topic=645222.msg4341240#msg4341240 date=1375201763]

[quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=645222.msg4341238#msg4341238 date=1375201670]
Top 2 are because */ isn’t connected to anything.
Bottom 3 are because you removed a bracket in the wrong spot
[/quote]show me the code pls

if (itemId == 15098 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 1200) { //Dice Bag ID if (c.playerRights < 1) { c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to dice."); return; } if (!c.inAclan) { c.sendMessage("Join a clan chat channel first!"); return; } int roll = Misc.random(99) + 1; Server.clanChat.playerMessageToClan(c.playerId, "[DICE YELL]: " + c.playerName + " rolled " + roll + " on the percentile dice."); c.startAnimation(11900); c.gfx0(2075); c.diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); } above there was an empty bracket i deleted it and now i only have 5 errors while i had 100 before
[/quote]That snippet of code has the correct number of opening and closing brackets. This is why we use IDEs![/quote]IDEd?

Read full topic
